product_name: ASICS GEL-NoosaFAST Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Triathletes seeking a go-fast shoe perfect for race day need look no further than the ASICS GEL-NoosaFAST Running Shoes. Elastic laces and grips on the heel and tongue tabs make transitions a breeze. No-sew construction allows for sockless wear so you won't waste any time transitioning. Vented midsoles and outsole minimize weight and maximize breathability. Racing-specific last has a tighter overall fit through the midsole and upper to minimize any excess baggage while running fast. Similar to the geometry seen in racing flats, a low, 8mm heel-toe differential reduces midsole weight to improve economy and encourage faster running. Firm Solyte midsoles increase responsiveness and enhance the ride from contact to toe-off. Lightweight heel construction comfortably hugs the foot while minimizing structural weight. Durasponge outsoles feature blown AHAR (ASICS High Abrasion Rubber) rubber compound for enhanced cushioning and durability in the forefeet. Minimal outsole material is positioned only in high abrasive areas to keep the ASICS GEL-NoosaFAST Running Shoes light. Closeout.
short_description: Triathletes seeking a go-fast shoe perfect for race day need look no further than the ASICS GEL-NoosaFAST Running Shoes. Elastic laces and grips on the heel and tongue tabs make transitions a breeze.
